data.value: The Incredibles: Rise of the Underminer

data.name: confirmDeleteMod
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete "{0}" by {1}?

data.name: dolphinNotFoundLabel
data.value: Dolphin executable not found on set path.

data.name: dolphinPathNotSetTooltip
data.value:
Dolphin executable path not set.
Please click on Settings > Choose Dolphin Path... and select the Dolphin executable. Selecting a shortcut is also possible.

data.name: dolphinUserFolderPathNotSetLabel
data.value: Dolphin user folder path not set.

data.name: dolphinUserFolderPathNotSetTooltip
data.value:
Dolphin user folder path not set.
Please click on Settings > Choose Dolphin User Folder Path... and select the Dolphin user folder. It is usually located in "AppData" (for newer installs), or "Documents\Dolphin Emulator". To find it, you can open Dolphin and select File > Open User Folder.

data.name: dolphinUserPathNotFoundLabel
data.value: Dolphin user folder not found on set path.

data.name: errorCreatingModZip
data.value: There was an error creating your mod ZIP archive:

data.name: noModsTooltip
data.value:
You do not have mods for this game.
Please click on "Add Mods" and select a mod ZIP file.

data.name: noBackupTooltip
data.value:
You do not have a backup for this game.
Please click on "Create Backup" and select the game's ISO file.

data.name: downloadPrompt
data.value: Do you wish to download it?

data.name: errorCheckingForUpdates
data.value: There was an error checking for updates:

data.name: selectGameTitle
data.value: Please select your game's ISO or the main.dol from an unchanged Dolphin dump.

data.name: DolPatchesInfo
data.value:
Enter patches to be applied to the game's DOL file, in the form of <offset> <value>, both 4-byte hexadecimal numbers, one per line. You can add comments after #s.
Example: 00287D10 53494D50 00287DB0 54455854 # This is a comment #another comment
Supported games: Scooby, BFBB, Movie, Incredibles, Underminer, RatProto

data.name: iniErrorGameBackupNotFound
data.value: Unable to import INI: game backup not found. Please create a backup from the original game's ISO file.

data.name: gameIdInfo
data.value:
Enter a custom game ID for the mod.
Save files are created using this game ID, enabling your mod to have a unique save file. Make sure no other GameCube or Wii game has the same ID. It is recommended to keep the first four characters the same and change only the last two. Must be 6 characters long. Leave blank for default.
Supported games: Scooby, BFBB, Movie, Incredibles, Underminer

data.name: iniNotFound
data.value: Unable to import INI: INI file not found at {0}

data.name: IniValuesInfo
data.value:
Enter the game's configuration INI key-value pairs for this mod, in the form of <key>=<value>, one per line. You can add comments after #s. You only need to enter the lines needed by your mod. Example:
BOOT=HB00 ShowMenuOnBoot=0 # This is a comment G.BubbleBowl=1 #another comment
On an already existing mod, click on 'Import' to import the mod's INI into here. Only modified values will be imported and the file itself will be deleted.
A few types of key are special because they can appear multiple times in the INI: - ScenePlayerMapping, ThresholdPointsRange and AlternateCostumeMapping: will replace values based on the stage ID name (first 4 characters of the value) - TaskStatus and Extra: if present, will replace ALL entries, so if you're replacing those, you must enter all of them. If you're still unsure how to use these keys, create your INI file manually, then use Import. The tool will import the values exactly as they are needed.
Supported games: Scooby, BFBB, Movie, Incredibles, Underminer, RatProto

data.name: mergeHipsInfo
data.value:
Enter your mod's HIP and HOP files which should be merged into the running copy of the game instead of replacing the original ones, one per line.
Assets from the mod will be imported into the destination archive, replacing any assets with the same asset ID if they exist. Assets of certain types will be merged into one (namely: Collision Table, Jaw Data Table, Level of Detail Table, Pipe Info Table, Shadow Table and Sound Info.
Example: boot.HIP hb/hb01.HOP mn/mn04.HIP
Supported games: Scooby, BFBB, Movie, Incredibles, Underminer, RatProto

data.name: modIdAlreadyExists
data.value: Unable to Create Mod: a mod with the same ID already exists.

data.name: modIdInfo
data.value: The Mod ID is generated automatically from the game name, author and mod name. Feel free to enter your own custom ID for the mod, but make sure that it's unique! No other mod, by any other author or for any other game, should have the same ID as yours. The Mod ID cannot be changed after the mod is created.

data.name: removeFilesInfo
data.value:
Enter the folders or files present in the original game which should be deleted from the mod, one per line.
Example: boot.HIP hb\hb01.HOP mn\mn04.HIP
Supported games: Scooby, BFBB, Movie, Incredibles, Underminer, RatProto

data.name: showCodesInfo
data.value:
codes to be applied by Dolphin. Format should be similar to Dolphin Settings: Each code starts with <code name>, then each line follows the format <offset> <value>, both 4-byte hexadecimal numbers. You can add comments after *s. Example:
$Blue Box Fix 043CD04C 00000000 *This is a comment
$Warp Anywhere 040BC1C8 38000001 040BC258 38000001 040BC300 38000001 *another comment
Supported games: Scooby, BFBB, Movie, Incredibles, Underminer, RatProto

data.name: dolphinUserFolderNotFoundLabel
data.value: Dolphin user folder not found on set path.

data.name: multipleModsSaveFilesTitle
data.value: Multiple mods use custom save files

data.name: multipleModsSaveFiles
data.value: Warning: Multiple mods which use custom save files are enabled. This might cause issues.
